Class DateUtils

java.lang.Object
main.utils.DateUtils
public class DateUtils extends Object
Utility class for date operations

    • parseDate

      public static Date parseDate(String dateStr)
      Converts a string to a Date object
      Parameters:
      dateStr - The date string in dd/MM/yyyy format
      Returns:
      The Date object, or null if parsing fails

    • formatDate

      public static String formatDate(Date date)
      Formats a Date object to a string in dd/MM/yyyy format
      Parameters:
      date - The Date object to format
      Returns:
      The formatted date string, or empty string if date is null

    • formatDateTime

      public static String formatDateTime(Date date)
      Formats a Date object to a string in dd/MM/yyyy HH:mm:ss format
      Parameters:
      date - The Date object to format
      Returns:
      The formatted date-time string, or empty string if date is null

    • isDateBetween

      public static boolean isDateBetween(Date date, Date startDate, Date endDate)
      Checks if a date is between two other dates (inclusive)
      Parameters:
      date - The date to check
      startDate - The start date
      endDate - The end date
      Returns:
      true if the date is between start and end dates, false otherwise

    • getCurrentDate

      public static Date getCurrentDate()
      Gets the current date with time set to 00:00:00
      Returns:
      The current date

    • isProjectOpen

      public static boolean isProjectOpen(Date openingDate, Date closingDate)
      Checks if a project is currently open for application
      Parameters:
      openingDate - The project opening date
      closingDate - The project closing date
      Returns:
      true if the current date is between opening and closing dates, false otherwise

    • isDateRangeOverlapping

      public static boolean isDateRangeOverlapping(Date start1, Date end1, Date start2, Date end2)
